title: （插件）关闭地图问题
author: east丶东
txt_content:
本帖最后由 east丶东 于 2020-3-29 18:40 编辑 

请问用什么方法可以删除地图，且不关闭后台可以生效

replies.author: east丶东
replies.txt_content: 或者有重载地图的方法也行

replies.author: Ir.Nep
replies.txt_content:
getServer().unloadWorld(World world, boolean saveBeforeUnload)

File.delete()

WorldCreator

getServer().createWorld(WorldCreator wc)

记得保留session.lock
